steps.step: Combine onion, vinegar, sugar, cinnamon stick, peppercorns and cloves in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cover, reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until the onion is tender-crisp, 4 to 6 minutes. Stir in beets.
Transfer to a large bowl and let marinate, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes.Tips & Notes
Make Ahead Tip: Cover and refrigerate for up to 1 week.Tip: How to Prep & Steam Beets: Trim greens (if any) and root end; peel the skin with a vegetable peeler.

name: Cut beets into 1/2- to 1-inch-thick cubes, wedges or slices.To steam on the stovetop
Place in a steamer basket over 1 inch of boiling water in a large pot. Cover and steam over high heat until tender, 10 to 15 minutes.To steam in the microwave

steps.step: Place in a glass baking dish, add 2 tablespoons water, cover tightly and microwave on High until tender, 8 to 10 minutes.

Let stand, covered, for 5 minutes.No time to prep? Look for Melissa's brand Peeled Baby Red Beets in the produce section of many supermarkets. They're peeled, steamed and ready to eat and contain far less sodium than their canned counterparts.Nutrition
